messages.subject: RE: [AlwaysLearning] Second that:  video game hardware info request--a big thank you!!
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you very much too, I have learned so much reading this list.  Lsia of great falls. ... From: Sharon Rudd [mailto:bearspawprint@yahoo.com] Sent:
messages.messageBody:
Thank you very much too, I have learned so much reading this list. Lsia
of great falls.

-----Original Message-----
From: Sharon Rudd [mailto:bearspawprint@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 28, 2002 8:07 AM
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] Second that: video game hardware info
request--a big thank you!!

Second that THANK YOU to Sandra and ALL of you on this
list.....for info in every area that is brought up,
and cautions and even reprimands ( I posted an Urban
Legand) when needed.

Sharon of the Swamp

--- carolyn <nielsonc@...> wrote:
> It never ceases to amaze me how generous and kind
> some people are in
> sharing their information with others, simply for
> the asking.
>
> Thanks oooh-gobs to Dan and Sandra. I'm so excited
> to get your emails!
> Now we get to do the really fun part - learn and try
> new games.
>
> Carolyn
>
>
>

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] video game hardware info request--a big thank you!!
messages.msgSnippet: It never ceases to amaze me how generous and kind some people are in sharing their information with others, simply for the asking. Thanks oooh-gobs to Dan and
messages.messageBody:
It never ceases to amaze me how generous and kind some people are in
sharing their information with others, simply for the asking.

Thanks oooh-gobs to Dan and Sandra. I'm so excited to get your emails!
Now we get to do the really fun part - learn and try new games.

Carolyn
